Package seedu.address.model.calendar

Class Day

  • java.lang.Object
    • seedu.address.model.calendar.Day
  • public class Day
extends java.lang.Object
    The day representation within the calendar of NOVA. Also contains an activity list to record all the activities happening on the day.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Day​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      Instantiates a new Day.

      Gets the first activity of the week.

      Returns true if the activity of interest is already in the calendar.

      Returns true if the activity can be added into the week.

        public java.util.Optional<Activity> deleteActivity​(ActivityReference activityReference)
        Deletes an activity from the day.
        Parameters:
        activityReference - the scaled-down version of an activity used to identify the actual activity
        Returns:
        An optional that holds the deleted activity if it exists
